view

Class aView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.aView

  • public class aView
extends java.lang.Object
    The taskListView class provides printing functionality of the Student Marks and the BST in the controller class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      aView() 

    • Method Summary

      void displayABSTItem(StudentMarks anItem)
      Display a Student Mark on the console
      void displayAsChart(BinarySearchTree<StudentMarks> theBST)
      Display the final chart of the module mark value of all Nodes of type Student Marks in the BST on the console.
      void displayBST(BinarySearchTree<StudentMarks> theBST, DisplayOrder order)
      Display the Binary Search Tree on the console
      void displayBSTItemAsc(Node<StudentMarks> root)
      Display the values of all Nodes of type Student Marks in the BST on the console, in ascending order, through recursion
      void displayBSTItemDesc(Node<StudentMarks> root)
      Display the values of all Nodes of type Student Marks in the BST on the console, in descending order, through recursion
      void displayStudentScoreInChart(Node<StudentMarks> root)
      Goes through all the Nodes of type Student Marks in the BST and display the student ID and the module mark value on the console, as a chart, through recursion

        root - the current Node of the tree that is being displayed through recursion
